about_the_game:
Mocaverse is a next-generation motion game that DOES NOT require players to wear or hold any extra hardware. The game can be controlled by your body movements which are captured by a single RGB camera! No need to purchase any extra hardware, all you need is an iPhone! (Will support Andriod later!)

To Play the Game:

1. Enter the game on computer and then scan the QR code shown on the left side with your iPhone and download the 'Mocaverse' App
2. Make sure that your iPhone and computer are connected to the same network!
3. Enter the 'Mocaverse' App and press the 'scan' button to scan the QR code shown on the right side of the game to connect your iPhone and computer and start
4. Place your iPhone 1.5 meters away from you with its back cameras facing you. Please make sure that its back cameras can capture your whole body and keep the 'Mocaverse' App running
5. Start to explore the game!

How to Play:

1. Move forward: walk in place, please remember to lift your knees
2. Turn: turn your shoulders to turn left or right
3. Enter the menu: raise your right arm over your head, and quickly swip it down to enter the menu
4. Select the mode: raise your arms in front of your chest to select and suspend to confirm your selection

Current Mode:

1. Seed Hunter: move your body left and right, up and down to collect seeds while aviod obstacles. Offline multiplayer mode is also availble.
2. Speed Runner: walk and run in place and turn your shoulders to turn left or right to pick up item boxes and aviod obstacles. Be careful, do not fall down!
3. Full-body Combat: coming soon!


Vision & MIssion: We believe that keyboards, mice and controllers are "outdated" input for games, while your body is the future! With your body, you no longer need to memorize all those complicated key combincations! All the movements are intuitive and with a higher degree of freedom and you have been practicing them for your whole life! You DO NOT control the character in the game, but you ARE the character! (You will know what I am talking about once you enter the game!)
